text: was a Japanese film director. He is known for directing Daiei films and jidaigeki television dramas. ==Selected filmography== ===Film=== *Akumyō Series (1961-66) *Sleepy Eyes of Death 1: The Chinese Jade (1963) *New Tale of Zatoichi (1963) *Zatoichi the Fugitive (1963) *Shinobi no Mono 4 Siege (1964) *Zatoichi's Vengeance (1966) *Heitai yakuza daidasso (1966) *Heitai yakuza nagurikomi (1967) *Heitai yakuza ore ni makasero (1967) *Sleepy Eyes of Death 10: Hell Is a Woman (1968) *Kanto onna yakuza (1968) *Kanto onna do konjo (1969) ===Television=== *Ronin of the Wilderness (1972-74) *Nemuri Kyōshirō (TV series) (1972) Episode2,4,13,14,19,20, *Hissatsu Shiokinin (1973) Episode20 *Tasukenin Hashiru (1973-74) Episode18,19,23,24,28,31,34 *Kurayami Shitomenin (1974) Episode5,6,15,20 *Amigasa Jūbei (1974-75) Episode1,2,16,17,18 *Nagasaki Hangachōu (1975) episode9,10,16 *Hissatsu Shiokiya Kagyō (1975) Episode24 *Zatoichi Monogatari (1974-78) *Hissatsu Shigotonin (1979-81) Episode19,21,28, 42,43,47,48,52,53,58,59,66,69,70,75,77,80 *Shin Hissatsu Shigotonin (1981-82) Episode3,9,10,14,15,20,29,30,35,37,43,47,52,53 *Hissatsu Shigotonin III (1982-83) Episode1,3,6,12,16,24,25,32 *Hissatsu Watashinin (1983) Episode1,2,6, *Hissatsu Shigotonin IV (1983-84) Episode1,2,4,8,9,15,21,29,32,38 *Hissatsu Shikirinin (1984) Episode13,15 *Hissatsu Shigotonin V (1985) Episode3,6,11, *Hissatsu Shigotonin V Gekitouhen Episode5 *Hissatsu Shigotonin V Senpuhen (1986-87) Episode3,6,9 *Nemuri Kyōshirō (1989) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1920 births Category:2007 deaths Category:People from Osaka Category:Japanese film directors
title: Tokuzō Tanaka
